name: Quiz
par: Questions are organized into a series of objecs. After loading the page and clicking on the new questions button, five new questions will be selected by random permutation and displayed to the user. Technologies: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Chat
par: Messages can be: created, read and deleted.Technologies: HTML, CSS, JavaScript and Firebase.

name: Flower shop
par: In this one, I showed the use of the form in the web shop to collect data from the user, recalculate and then display those results to the user. Technologies: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Movie Search App
par: This application allows searching movies, from a json file. Technologies: ReactJS and CSS.

name: Knitting
